elements.title: blue lace agate (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that most blue lace agate (example pictured) was sourced from a single mine in Namibia until 2017?

elements.title: Winter Kept Us Warm (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the cast of the 1965 film Winter Kept Us Warm were not told about its queer subject matter?

elements.title: 2025 Enderlin tornado (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the 2025 Enderlin tornado threw train cars nearly twice as far as required to qualify for the highest intensity tornado rating?

elements.title: Mentsuyu Hitori Meshi (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the manga series Mentsuyu Hitori Meshi has recipes on cooking with mentsuyu?

elements.title: Hostage (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Hostage, a book written by Eli Sharabi after surviving 491 days in Hamas captivity, became the fastest-selling book in Hebrew-language publishing history?

elements.title: Yuki Wakai (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Yuki Wakai gave up her dream to be a singer-songwriter to become an idol singer, only to later become a singer-songwriter?

elements.title: Reinhard Höhn (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Nazi officer Reinhard Höhn founded a business school after the Second World War?

elements.title: Saru (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Doug Jones considered retiring from creature-acting work until being offered the role of Saru on Star Trek: Discovery?

elements.title: Ja'Markis Weston (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that one sportswriter said: "If Dr. Frankenstein could construct a football player, Ja'Markis Weston would emerge from the lab"?

elements.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Destination of the Month

Kowloon

One of the most densely populated cities on Earth, Hong Kong's mainland portion offers a culture less influenced by the British than the neighboring Island, plus accommodation, dining, and nightlife are generally cheaper.

elements.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Off the Beaten Path

El Cuyo

El Cuyo beckons to visitors looking for a quiet, natural seaside town to bask in the sun undisturbed by revelers while other visitors seek adrenaline-pumping excitement.

elements.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Featured Travel Topic

San Diego International Airport

The main airport to America's finest city is the busiest single runway airport in the world.
